name: NORTH DAKOTA HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for extensions of expiring Medicare provisions, extension of the Children's Health Insurance Program and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program's payments to hospitals.
Monitored development of Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018, Omnibus Appropriations Act and continuing spending resolution to fund the government.
Advocate for passage of opioid legislation and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program's payments to hospitals.
Advocate for passage of opioid legislation and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program's payments to hospitals.
